verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

Moses

וְזֶ֨ה <WH2088> ve-Zeh now this מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh And this work הַמְּנֹרָה֙ <WH4501> ham-me-no-Rah of the candlestick מִקְשָׁ֣ה <WH4749> mik-Shah [was of] beaten זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> za-Hav, gold עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against יְרֵכָ֥הּ <WH3409> ye-re-Chah unto the shaft עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- to its פִּרְחָ֖הּ <WH6525> pir-Chah thereof unto the flowers מִקְשָׁ֣ה <WH4749> mik-Shah thereof [was] beaten work הִ֑וא <WH1931> hi he כַּמַּרְאֶ֗ה <WH4758> kam-mar-'Eh, according unto the pattern אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הֶרְאָ֤ה <WH7200> her-'Ah had shewed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, Moses כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> ken so עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah so he made אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמְּנֹרָֽה׃ <WH4501> ham-me-no-Rah. the candlestick פ Peh

וְלָֽקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> ve-la-ke-Chu Then let them take פַּ֣ר <WH6499> par bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- afflicted בָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> ba-Kar, bull וּמִנְחָת֔וֹ <WH4503> u-min-cha-To, with his meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <WH5560> So-let [even] fine flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> vash-Sha-men; with oil וּפַר־ <WH6499> u-far- bullock שֵׁנִ֥י <WH8145> she-Ni and another בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- afflicted בָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> ba-Kar bull תִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> tik-Kach shalt thou take לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> le-chat-Tat. for a sin offering

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֥ <WH7126> ve-hik-rav-Ta And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim the Levites לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; God וְסָמְכ֧וּ <WH5564> ve-sa-me-Chu shall put בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> ye-dei-Hem their hands עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim. upon the Levites
